#summary Projects created on Bremen GTUG events

= Projects =

Here you find all projects created on Bremen GTUG events.


= Hackathon 2011 =

On our first [http://bremen.gtugs.org/events/vergangene-events/2011/ersterhackathon Hackathon] we programmed an event management app for the Bremen GTUG. It is still unfinished and needs some developers to finish it.

= Global Android Dev Camp 2012 =

On the [http://android-dev-camp-2012.blogspot.com/ Global Android Dev Camp 2012] we programmed a multiplayer game. Therefore we used the game idea of labyrinth and extended it.
